contents:
蓬佩奥：先过俺这一关（辛普森斗图）！
https://twitter.com/mikepompeo/status/1224910919697944576

观众不满，声优也不满：
https://twitter.com/YeardleySmith/status/1225068509899571200
That’s pretty good! I might just add f--- y-- Mike for co-opting my character to troll Speaker Pelosi. Be a leader and fight you own fight! Oh, wait I forgot, you’re a follower.
